action-view.name: product.root.product
action-view.title: All products
action-view.domain: self.endDate IS NULL or CURRENT_DATE < self.endDate

action-view.name: product.root.filters.obsoleteproducts
action-view.title: All obsolete products
action-view.domain: self.endDate IS NOT NULL and CURRENT_DATE > self.endDate

action-view.name: mail.conf.mail.model.tag
action-view.title: Les balises de modèles de courrier

action-view.name: googledocument.all
action-view.title: Google Document
action-view.domain: self.driveUser=:drive_user_doc and (self.fileType=:file_type_doc or self.fileType=:file_type_odt or self.fileType=:file_type_txt or self.fileType=:file_type_pdf or self.fileType=:file_type_csv or self.fileType=:file_google_ppt or self.fileType=:file_google_doc) and self.trashed=:not_trashed and self.sharedWithMe=:not_sharedWithMe

action-view.name: googlespreadsheet.all
action-view.title: Google SpreadSheet
action-view.domain: self.driveUser=:drive_user and (self.fileType=:file_xls or self.fileType=:file_ods or self.fileType=:file_google_spreadSheet) and self.trashed=false and self.sharedWithMe=:not_sharedWithMe
